comment.author: Austin
comment.text: All these people bashing trump and not Obama then say something about God really if u are truly a Christian WAKE Up.is their really a choice hiliary are you nuts.

replies.author: Nathan
replies.text: If you are truly a Christian. ...you would never vote for or even consider voting for TRUMP!

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: Nathan how can you even say that with all the things the Clintons have done

replies.author: Austin
replies.text: Im saying you would have to be nuts to vote for her.trump is the only clear choice
